price: 29. Tokkel qaran kee baaxó keenih (firqawnaa kee firqawni mara kinnuk) maweeqinnaay, digaalák mohlá kah yeceen mara makkon.
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famā bakat ʿalayhimu al-samāu wal-arḍu wamā kānū munẓarīna
